wikipedia_page.main:
Robert Reid (1831 – 30 March 1875) was a Liberal Party politician.
He was elected Liberal MP for Kirkcaldy Burghs in 1874 but died less than a year into the role in 1875.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1874 United Kingdom general election
response: | Robert Reid
|Robert Reid

The Kirkcaldy Burghs by-election of 1875 was fought on 20 April 1875.  The byelection was fought due to the death of the incumbent Liberal MP, Robert Reid.  It was won by the Liberal candidate George Campbell.
